languages.text: {n}Выжившие офицеры вокруг вас словно оживают: воздух вокруг вас наполняется голосами, слышны команды, у кого-то сдают нервы — вы слышите рыдания. Абеляр, не глядя, влепляет плачущему офицеру затрещину.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Выжившие офицеры вокруг вас словно оживают: воздух вокруг вас наполняется голосами, слышны команды, у кого-то сдают нервы — вы слышите рыдания. Абеляр, не глядя, влепляет плачущему офицеру затрещину.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Выжившие офицеры вокруг вас словно оживают: воздух вокруг вас наполняется голосами, слышны команды, у кого-то сдают нервы — вы слышите рыдания. Абеляр, не глядя, влепляет плачущему офицеру затрещину.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors must have cracked. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}

{n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的话语似乎将军官们从不知所措的状态中唤醒，你周围传来了谈话声与传达命令的声音。你听到有人抽泣起来，某个幸存者承受不了这巨大的压力，崩溃了。阿贝拉德连正眼都没看一眼，便把那位哭泣的军官铐了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话语似乎将军官们从不知所措的状态中唤醒，你周围传来了谈话声与传达命令的声音。你听到有人抽泣起来，某个幸存者承受不了这巨大的压力，崩溃了。阿贝拉德连正眼都没看一眼，便把那位哭泣的军官铐了起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras parecen sacar a los oficiales de su estupor, y pronto las voces y las órdenes llenan el aire. Oyes a alguien sollozar: uno de los supervivientes cae ante la presión. Abelard le esposa sin dedicarle siquiera una mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras parecen sacar a los oficiales de su estupor, y pronto las voces y las órdenes llenan el aire. Oyes a alguien sollozar: uno de los supervivientes cae ante la presión. Abelard le esposa sin dedicarle siquiera una mirada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの一声は士官たちを昏迷から解放したようで、周囲の空気は話し声と発令される命令で満たされる。すると、どこからか、すすり泣く声が聞こえてくる。生存者の一人がストレスをこらえきれずにいるようだ。アベラルドは泣く士官を見もせずに手錠をかけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの一声は士官たちを昏迷から解放したようで、あなたの周りの空気は話し声と発令される命令で満たされる。どこからかすすり泣く声が聞こえる。生存者の一人がストレスをこらえきれずにいる。アベラルドは泣き叫ぶ士官を見もせずに手錠をかけた。{/n}
{n}あなたの一声は士官たちを昏迷から解放したようで、周囲の空気は話し声と発令される命令で満たされる。すると、どこからか、すすり泣く声が聞こえてくる。生存者の一人がストレスをこらえきれずにいるようだ。アベラルドは泣く士官を見もせずに手錠をかけた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles semblent sortir les officiers de leur stupeur et la passerelle s'emplit de voix et d'ordres lancés. Vous entendez quelqu'un sangloter, l'un des survivants submergé par le stress. Abélard lui assène une gifle du revers de la main sans même le regarder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles semblent sortir les officiers de leur stupeur et la passerelle s'emplit de voix et d'ordres lancés. Vous entendez quelqu'un sangloter, l'un des survivants submergé par le stress. Abélard lui assène une gifle du revers de la main sans même le regarder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte scheinen die Offiziere aus ihrer Benommenheit zu reißen, und die Luft um dich herum füllt sich mit Stimmen und Befehlen. Du hörst jemanden schluchzen – für einen der Überlebenden war der Stress zu viel. Abelard maßregelt den weinenden Offizier, ohne auch nur hinzusehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte scheinen die Offiziere aus ihrer Benommenheit zu reißen, und die Luft um dich herum füllt sich mit Stimmen und Befehlen. Du hörst jemanden schluchzen – für einen der Überlebenden war der Stress zu viel. Abelard maßregelt den weinenden Offizier, ohne auch nur hinzusehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin, subayları içine düştükleri uyuşukluk çukurundan çıkarmış olacak ki etrafın bir anda konuşmalarla ve yağan emirlerle doluyor. Birinin ağladığını duyuyorsun, sağ kalanlardan biri yaşadığı strese teslim olmuş. Abelard, bakmaya bile lüzum görmeden ağlayan subayı kelepçeliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words seem to knock the officers out of their stupor, and the air around you fills with voices and commands being issued. You hear someone sobbing — one of the survivors buckling under the stress. Abelard cuffs the crying officer without even looking.{/n}
